attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: how come my expences are subject to the inland revenue and mp  expenses are subject to an independent reveue and though they paid the sums back are they going to be taxed on these sums and if not why

rejection.details: This is a matter for direct communication with Parliament.
reasons: Statements that don't actually request any action
Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
